PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: WILLIAM PAGE, a boy, son to Page.
SIR HUGH EVANS, a Welsh parson.
MISTRESS QUICKLY, servant to Doctor Caius.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Windsor. Before PAGE's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SHALLOW, SLENDER, and SIR HUGH EVANS
Enter FALSTAFF, BARDOLPH, NYM, and PISTOL

Enter ANNE PAGE, with wine; MISTRESS FORD
and MISTRESS PAGE, following
Exeunt all except SHALLOW, SLENDER, and SIR HUGH EVANS
Exeunt SHALLOW and SIR HUGH EVANS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR HUGH EVANS and SIMPLE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A room in the Garter Inn.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter FALSTAFF, Host, BARDOLPH, NYM, PISTOL,
and ROBIN

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. A room in DOCTOR CAIUS' house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY, SIMPLE, and RUGBY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Before PAGE'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter MISTRESS PAGE, with a letter
Enter FORD with PISTOL, and PAGE with NYM
MISTRESS PAGE and MISTRESS FORD come forward
Exeunt MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and MISTRESS QUICKLY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A room in the Garter Inn.
SCENE III. A field near Windsor.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Host, SHALLOW, SLENDER, and PAGE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A field near Frogmore.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR HUGH EVANS and SIMPLE
Enter Host, DOCTOR CAIUS, and RUGBY
Exeunt SHALLOW, SLENDER, PAGE, and Host

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A street .
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER, Host,
SIR HUGH EVANS, DOCTOR CAIUS, and RUGBY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A room in FORD'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter MISTRESS FORD and MISTRESS PAGE
Gets into the basket; they cover him with foul linen
Enter FORD, PAGE, DOCTOR CAIUS, and SIR HUGH EVANS
Exeunt PAGE, DOCTOR CAIUS, and SIR HUGH EVANS

Re-enter FORD, PAGE, DOCTOR CAIUS, and
SIR HUGH EVANS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. A room in PAGE'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SHALLOW, SLENDER, and MISTRESS QUICKLY
Exeunt MISTRESS PAGE and ANNE PAGE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. A room in the Garter Inn.
SCENE I. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS QUICKLY, and
WILLIAM PAGE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A room in FORD'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Re-enter MISTRESS FORD with two Servants

Enter FORD, PAGE, SHALLOW, DOCTOR CAIUS, and
SIR HUGH EVANS
Pulling clothes out of the basket

Re-enter FALSTAFF in woman's clothes, and
MISTRESS PAGE

Exeunt FORD, PAGE, SHALLOW, DOCTOR CAIUS, and
SIR HUGH EVANS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A room in the Garter Inn.
SCENE IV. A room in FORD'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter PAGE, FORD, MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD,
and SIR HUGH EVANS
Exeunt PAGE, FORD, and SIR HUGH EVANS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. A room in the Garter Inn.
SCENE VI. Another room in the Garter Inn.
SCENE I. A room in the Garter Inn.
SCENE II. Windsor Park.
SCENE III. A street leading to the Park.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and
DOCTOR CAIUS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Windsor Park.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SIR HUGH EVANS, disguised, with others as Fairies

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Another part of the Park.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter MISTRESS FORD and MISTRESS PAGE

Enter SIR HUGH EVANS, disguised as before; PISTOL,
as Hobgoblin; MISTRESS QUICKLY, ANNE PAGE, and
others, as Fairies, with tapers
They burn him with their tapers

During this song they pinch FALSTAFF. DOCTOR CAIUS
comes one way, and steals away a boy in green;
SLENDER another way, and takes off a boy in white;
and FENTON comes and steals away ANN PAGE.
A noise of hunting is heard within. All the
Fairies run away. FALSTAFF pulls off his buck's
head, and rises
Enter PAGE, FORD, MISTRESS PAGE, and MISTRESS FORD
